column.name: label
column.comment: label to display on user interface

column.comment: 1=> user can write/manage it during specification design

column.comment: 1=> show it during test case execution

column.comment: 1=> user can write/manage it during test case execution

column.comment: NULL will be considered as NO DATA Provided by user
